00081    public:
00082 
00083       enum tType {
00087          NODE,
00091          APPROXIMATENODE,
00095          OBJECT,
00099          APPROXIMATEOBJECT
00100       };
00101 
00105       typedef ObjectType tObject;
00106 
00111       ~stGenericEntry(){
00112          if (Mine){
00113             if (this->Object != NULL){
00114                delete this->Object;
00115             }//end if
00116          }//end if
00117       }//end ~stGenericEntry
00118 
00124       void SetPageID(stPageID pageID){
00125          this->PageID = pageID;
00126       }//end SetPageID
00127

00132          return this->PageID;
00133       }//end GetPageID

00341 template < class ObjectType >
00342 class stGenericPriorityQueue{
00343    public:
00344 
00348       typedef ObjectType tObject;
00349 
00353       typedef stGenericEntry < ObjectType > tGenericEntry;
00354 
00358       stGenericPriorityQueue(){
00359          this->Occupation = 0;
00360          this->Head = NULL;
00361       }//end stGenericPriorityQueue
00362 
00366       ~stGenericPriorityQueue();
00367 
00378       void Add(tObject * object, stPageID pageID, stDistance distanceRepQuery,
00379          stDistance distanceRep, stDistance radius, int type);
00380 
00390       void Add(tObject * object, stPageID pageID, stDistance distanceQuery,
00391          stDistance radius, int type);
00392 
00401       void Add(tObject * object, stDistance distanceRep,
00402          stDistance distanceRepQuery, int type);
00403 
00411       void Add(tObject * object, stDistance distanceQuery, int type);
00412 
00418       tGenericEntry * Get();
00419 
00423       stCount GetSize(){
00424          return this->Occupation;
00425       }//end GetSize
00426       
00430       bool IsEmpty(){
00431          return (this->Head==NULL);
00432       }//end IsEmpty
00433 
00434    private:
00435 
00439       tGenericEntry * Head;
00440 
00444       stCount Occupation;
00445 
00446 };//end stGenericPriorityQueue

00449 // class template stGenericPriorityHeap
00450 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00466 template <class ObjectType>
00467 class stGenericPriorityHeap{
00468 
00469    public:
00470 
00477       enum tType {
00481          OBJECT,
00485          APPROXIMATEOBJECT,
00489          NODE,
00493          APPROXIMATENODE
00494       };
00495 
00499       typedef ObjectType tObject;
00500 
00522       stGenericPriorityHeap(int initialSize, int increment = 32){
00523          this->Increment = increment;
00524          this->MaxSize = initialSize;
00525          this->Size = 0;
00526          Entries = new tGenericEntry[MaxSize];
00527       }//end stGenericPriorityHeap
00528 
00532       ~stGenericPriorityHeap();
00533 
00547       void Add(tObject * object, stPageID pageID,
00548                stDistance distanceQuery, stDistance distanceRep, stDistance distanceRepQuery,
00549                stDistance radius, stCount height, tType type);
00550 
00565       bool Get(tObject * & object, stPageID & pageID,
00566                stDistance & distanceQuery, stDistance & distanceRep, stDistance & distanceRepQuery,
00567                stDistance & radius, stCount & height, tType & type);
00568 
00572       int GetSize(){
00573          return Size;
00574       }//end GetSize
00575       
00576    private:
00577 
00581       struct tGenericEntry{
00585          tObject * Object;
00586 
00590          bool Mine;
00591 
00595          stPageID PageID;
00596 
00600          stCount Height;
00601 
00606          stDistance Distance;
00607 
00611          stDistance DistanceQuery;
00612 
00616          stDistance DistanceRep;
00617 
00621          stDistance DistanceRepQuery;
00622 
00626          stDistance Radius;
00627 
00631          tType Type;
00632       };
00633 
00637       tGenericEntry * Entries;
00638 
00642       int MaxSize;
00643 
00647       int Size;
00648 
00652       int Increment;
00653       
00660       int GetMinChild(int parent){
00661          int c = (parent * 2) + 1;
00662 
00663          if ((c + 1 < Size) && (Entries[c + 1].Distance < Entries[c].Distance)){
00664             return c + 1;
00665          }else if (c + 1 < Size){
00666             if ((Entries[c + 1].Distance == Entries[c].Distance) &&
00667                 (Entries[c + 1].Type < Entries[c].Type)){
00668                return c + 1;
00669             }else if ((Entries[c + 1].Distance == Entries[c].Distance) &&
00670                 (Entries[c + 1].Type == Entries[c].Type) &&
00671                 (Entries[c + 1].Height > Entries[c].Height)){
00672                return c + 1;
00673             }else{
00674                return c;
00675             }//end if
00676          }else if (c < Size){
00677             return c;
00678          }else{
00679             return -1;
00680          }//end if
00681       }//end GetMinChild
00682    
00687       void Resize();
00688 
00689 };//end stGenericPriorityHeap
